content.prompt: This work can be attributed to the prehistoric culture that produced the

choices.label: running horned woman from Tassili n'Ajjer, Algeria
Ambum stone from Papua New Guinea
Tlatilco female figurine from Central Mexico
anthropomorphic stele from the Arabian Peninsula

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
